topic.title: UK Covid Track and Trace App (Fake)
topic.body:
Fed up having to give your every move to the UK government when you visit a venue? Use this app to fake checking in venues. Just click "Back to Home" to enter the venue name and the time/date stamp will also be visible. 

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FygEuUXVXfGz5CrsxH9iJH9WmQbtEUnUd

1620117334_1AEUvcwh6yyUse45jWaK5NqrVwkWr.body: It is indeed a sad state of affairs. I'm in the UK and the noose just keeps getting tighter. If you are against the official narrative then you are deemed a terrorist. I've been trying to tell people I know for years that all these terrorism laws are eventually  going to be used on the public. You can guess the usual response this triggered. I think a cyber attack will happen then they will try for an internet access pass or something.

1620417095_17ufjt7e9DRsavS6AADWoGpiutSp8.body: Is TrueCrypt still supported? Did it not end in 2014???
are you using winXP as i think no support for anything after XP.
bitlocker. think thats what replaced it the most.

1620343496_1P1rwS5wiQ32NDHRPFLjFLJMZZaa2.body: After you have entered the venue name click on "Cancel this check-in" for fullscreen. Is this what you meant???
